data.description:
The theme of AVATAVI is "Adventure in the real world with your favorite avatar"!
It is an AR application that allows you to make your own miniature avatar or favorite character appear in the real world and go on adventures together!

[ How to play ]
Let's take a walk in the real world!
The stage is the real world! Let's play by wandering around the real world using the move cursor.

Let's make them dance!
By default, there are 6 types of motions such as dances and poses set.

Let's change the size!
Swipe with two fingers to increase or decrease the size of your avatar.

Take photos and videos!
Take photos and videos with your avatar to record your precious memories.

[ About adding avatars ]
AVATAVI does not have a character generation function. Instead, it has a function to easily add your favorite character CG created by various external services or by yourself.

Search and add from external services!
AVATAVI is integrated with Sketchfab and VRoid Hub, the world's largest 3D model sharing platform, and you can search for and add avatars published by creators around the world.

Add your own avatar!
You can upload your own avatar to a cloud service such as Dropbox or Google Drive and paste the URL, or add a file saved on your device to use as your own avatar.

Example of how to create an avatar
- Modeling by yourself using 3DCG software
-Scan your entire body in a 3D studio.

*Please check the official website as we are constantly updating the formats that can be added.
